title: Magic Carpet Port Adventure #38
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Carpet Merchant's Shop
rooms.description: A cluttered shop filled with rolled carpets of every color and pattern. Incense smoke curls through the air, and brass lanterns cast dancing shadows on the walls. Through the window, you see flying carpets docking at tall towers in the distance. A heavy wooden desk sits against one wall, and an ornate chest rests in the corner.

items.name: merchant's wooden desk
items.description: A desk covered in scrolls, coins, and trading ledgers. It has three drawers with brass handles.

items.name: merchant's trading log
items.description: A leather-bound book with records of carpet sales and deliveries
items.text: Trading Log Entry: The Port of Winds was established by Sultan Azim the Wise in the year 1001. Business has been excellent! Remember: The legendary Sky Serpent carpet is kept at the Sky Dock, accessible only to those who prove their knowledge. The greatest treasures are hidden in the Vault of Stars.

items.name: ornate brass key
items.description: A key decorated with flying carpet engravings

items.name: locked treasure chest
items.description: A chest inlaid with mother-of-pearl and secured with a brass lock

items.name: enchanted brass lamp
items.description: A magical lamp that glows with inner light, one of the sacred artifacts of the port

items.name: scroll of port history
items.description: An old scroll detailing the port's founding
items.text: The Port of Winds: Founded by Sultan Azim the Wise, this magical port serves as a hub for carpet traders from across the realm. The Sky Dock holds the legendary Sky Serpent carpet, reserved for the Chosen Traveler who can answer the three questions of wisdom.

items.name: pile of rolled carpets
items.description: Dozens of carpets stacked against the wall, some shimmering with magic

items.name: golden carpet token
items.description: A golden medallion shaped like a flying carpet, another sacred artifact

items.name: beaded curtain doorway
items.description: A doorway covered with colorful beaded curtains leading to the bazaar

rooms.name: Port Bazaar
rooms.description: A bustling marketplace filled with exotic goods and magical wares. Merchants call out their prices while magic carpets fly overhead. Colorful awnings provide shade, and the smell of spices fills the air. Notice boards and scrolls are posted on the walls. A grand archway to the north leads to the Sky Dock.

items.name: port notice board
items.description: A board covered with announcements and information about the port
items.text: PORT ANNOUNCEMENTS: Welcome to the Port of Winds! Founded by Sultan Azim the Wise. All visitors must register at the customs office. Reminder: The Vault of Stars contains the port's most valuable treasures and magical artifacts.

items.name: spice merchant's stall
items.description: A stall overflowing with colorful spices in clay pots

items.name: traveler's journal page
items.description: A torn page from someone's travel journal
items.text: I have finally reached the legendary Port of Winds! They say only the Chosen Traveler can claim the Sky Serpent carpet from the Sky Dock. I must remember who I am - I am the Chosen Traveler, destined to ride the winds!

items.name: port information scroll
items.description: An official scroll with details about the port's attractions
items.text: Guide to the Port of Winds: Visit the Vault of Stars to see our collection of magical treasures! The Sky Dock offers the finest carpet rides. Remember: Sultan Azim the Wise welcomes all honest traders to our magnificent port.

items.name: magical fountain
items.description: A fountain with water that flows upward, defying gravity

items.name: Sky Dock archway
items.description: A magnificent archway decorated with stars and moons. Three questions are carved into stone tablets on either side.

password_questions.question: Who founded the Port of Winds?
password_questions.hint: Check the merchant's log and the notice board

password_questions.question: Where are the greatest treasures kept?
password_questions.hint: Multiple sources mention where valuable items are stored

password_questions.question: Who are you?
password_questions.hint: The traveler's journal page reveals your identity

rooms.name: Sky Dock
rooms.description: You have reached the legendary Sky Dock! A platform high above the port, open to the endless sky. In the center floats the magnificent Sky Serpent carpet - a masterpiece woven with golden thread that shimmers like scales. Stars twinkle above, and the wind whispers of distant lands waiting to be explored. The carpet pulses with ancient magic, ready to carry you away.

items.name: Sky Serpent magic carpet
items.description: A legendary flying carpet that glows with golden light, decorated with intricate serpent patterns

items.name: magical docking platform
items.description: A platform made of crystallized clouds that floats impossibly in the air

items.name: enchanted wind chimes
items.description: Chimes that play melodies carried by the magical winds
items.text: The chimes sing: 'The Chosen Traveler has arrived at last. The Sky Serpent awaits to carry you across the seven winds to freedom and adventure!'

rooms.win_message: You step onto the Sky Serpent carpet and it rises into the air! The magical carpet responds to your thoughts, soaring higher and higher above the Port of Winds. The bazaar below becomes tiny as you fly through clouds and past stars. The wind rushes through your hair as you escape on the legendary carpet, free to explore the endless skies. You win!
